original_text: And there were four leprous men at the entering in of the gate: and they said one to another, Why sit we here until we die?
korean_text: 성문 어귀에 나병환자 네 사람이 있더니 그 친구에게 서로 말하되 우리가 어찌하여 여기 앉아서 죽기를 기다리랴

sentences.original_text: And there were four leprous men
at the entering in of the gate
and they said one to another
Why sit we here until we die?
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 어째서 여기에 앉아 죽을 때까지 기다리는가?
